entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, being held captive by Quirrell.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is possessed by Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who has a complicated past with Harry's father and Quirrell.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, possessing Quirrell.

relationships.description: Quirrell and Snape had a past relationship at Hogwarts.
Quirrell is possessed by Lord Voldemort and serves him.
Snape dislikes Harry, but does not want him dead.
